Module RMI
Package it.unipr.barbato.Controller

Class CallbackClient

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.barbato.Controller.CallbackClient
public class CallbackClient extends Object
The CallbackClient class represents a client that interacts with a remote server using RMI (Remote Method Invocation). It subscribes to the offers list and purchases products from the products list. Each client creates a remote object that will be used by the server to retrieve possible offers for the products. The client periodically choose a product SN from the products list; Generate a random offer between 10 and 200 and wait server response. After 10 purchases client logs out of the shop.
Author:
Vincenzo Barbato 345728
